EmailTemplate.name: Change of Thesis Title Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Thesis Title Confirmation - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I wish to confirm that your thesis title is now updated in the system and you can view this change via WES.
Should you require any further changes or assistance, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
